name: Brain Teasers Race Cars (a match puzzle slide game)
name_original: Brain Teasers Race Cars (a match puzzle slide game)
description:
Get the super cars you dreamt about on your phone screen now! Dude don't leave them damaged! Repair the amazing cars solving the jigsaw type puzzles. Not only children but also parents will have a lots of fun playing. It's an amazingly string brain teaser for you! Match the crushed cars and drive like a man xD

Product Features :
• 20 super cars
• Cool music
• Jigsaw type puzzles

Happy Matching :D
